parseFileToJson(String) - Method in class zyklone.LEDCloud.LEDCloud
Tries to read the content of a file and parse it into a json-array.
parseLedMeshOrder(String) - Method in class zyklone.LEDCloud.Tester
 
parser - Static variable in class zyklone.LEDCloud.networking.Server
 
Pattern - Class in zyklone.LEDCloud.patterns
This class represents the interface between the LEDCloud and all possible patterns, for the LEDCloud to have a way of accessing the patterns' current pictures and sending them to the led-strip.
Pattern(int, int) - Constructor for class zyklone.LEDCloud.patterns.Pattern
 
patterns - Variable in class zyklone.LEDCloud.LEDCloud
 
patterns - Variable in class zyklone.LEDCloud.patterns.BackgroundPattern
the list of patterns this Pattern is comprised of

pictureSizeX - Variable in class zyklone.LEDCloud.patterns.Pattern
 
pictureSizeY - Variable in class zyklone.LEDCloud.patterns.Pattern
 
playAlarm() - Method in class zyklone.LEDCloud.LEDCloud
Waits until shortly before the alarm-time, slowly fades in a white light, stays there for 2 minutes and then starts flashing the white light, starting off slowly and getting more aggressive as time passes.
playIntro() - Method in class zyklone.LEDCloud.LEDCloud
Plays the RainbowPattern for 5 seconds and then shuts off all LEDs.
playNotification(Color) - Method in class zyklone.LEDCloud.LEDCloud
Sets the Cloud to flash all LEDs 2 times with the specified color and then restore its prior state.
playNotification() - Method in class zyklone.LEDCloud.LEDCloud
Fades out the currently set color if any, then flashes the notification-color 2 times and restores the state prior to the notification.
port - Variable in class zyklone.LEDCloud.networking.Server
 
processAlarmCommand(JSONObject) - Method in class zyklone.LEDCloud.networking.Server
Tries to extract a time out of the passed JSON-Object, parse it and set the clouds status to alarm-mode.
processCommand(String) - Method in class zyklone.LEDCloud.networking.Server
Takes the incoming message, tries to convert it into a json-object and extract a valid command from it.
processMode() - Method in class zyklone.LEDCloud.LEDCloud
Sets / Advances the LEDs according to the last set status, or just waits 500ms if there is nothing to do.
processPatterns() - Method in class zyklone.LEDCloud.LEDCloud
Populates the patterns-list with new patterns (by chance, or if there are less than 2), creates a new "dark" picture (2D-array with black color objects), adds each pattern to it, one by one and sends the complete picture (comPic) to the lightstrip.
progress - Variable in class zyklone.LEDCloud.patterns.RainbowPattern
